title: Mick Munter and the Mothman
description:
Mick Munter is back in search of another cryptid! This time... THE MOTHMAN!!!


Draw us a picture of what you think Mick Munter and the Mothman, or any of our other characters look like, and then tag us in it @storiespodcast! We'd love to see it and share it on our feed!!


If you would like to support Stories Podcast, you can subscribe and give us a five star review on iTunes, head to patreon.com/stories and pledge to make a monthly donation, check out our merch at storiespodcast.com/shop, follow us on Instagram @storiespodcast, or just tell your friends about us! 


Thank you!! Stay safe!!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
